title: Drawing, "Textile Design:  Lenglen", designed 1927
medium: Brush and gouache, black ink, graphite on paper
inscribed: Inscribed in pen and black ink on mount, upper left corner: LENGLEN; Inscribed in blue crayon on mount, upper right corner: (can't see because of frame)
creditline: Museum purchase from Smithsonian Collections Acquisition and Decorative Arts Association Acquisition Funds
description: Stripped pattern of irregular vertical rectangles with scattered circles in green.

exhibitions.title: Glass of the Avant-Garde: From the Vienna Secession to the Bauhaus
